titles: Altare Christianum: or, The dead vicars plea Wherein the vicar of Gr. being dead, yet speaketh, and pleadeth out of antiquity, against him that hath broken downe his altar. Presented, and humbly submitted to the consideration of his superiours, the governours of our Church. By Iohn Pocklington. Dr. D.
author: Pocklington, John.
notes: A reply to "A coale from the altar" by Peter Heylyn, and to a letter by John Williams to the vicar at Grantham.
Variant: hand stamped in red ink below the imprint: Are to be sould by N: Vavasour at his shopp in the Inner Temple:.
